meanings.definition: In a luxurious or extravagant manner.
meanings.sent1: She lived sybaritically, surrounded by opulent furnishings and lavish decorations.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy heiress traveled sybaritically, staying in the most luxurious hotels.
meanings.sent3: The pampered cat lounged sybaritically on a velvet cushion, enjoying the softness.
meanings.sent4: The garden party was sybaritically decorated with cascading flowers and crystal chandeliers.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the meal sybaritically, using only the finest ingredients and exotic spices.

meanings.sent1: The spa offered a sybaritically relaxing experience with massages and aromatherapy.
meanings.sent2: She had a sybaritically decadent dessert, savoring every rich and sweet bite.
meanings.sent3: The movie depicted a sybaritically lavish lifestyle of the main character, indulging in luxury.
meanings.sent4: The music festival was a sybaritically delightful experience, with soothing melodies and vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious silk sheets felt sybaritically smooth against her skin, enhancing her comfort.
